## Pull Request Guidelines

When creating pull requests, follow Conventional Commits format as defined in `.github/workflows/pr-title-check.yml`:

**Format**: `<type>: <Subject starting with uppercase>`

**Allowed types**:
- `feat` - New feature
- `fix` - Bug fix
- `docs` - Documentation changes
- `chore` - Maintenance tasks
- `refactor` - Code refactoring
- `test` - Test additions/modifications
- `ci` - CI/CD changes
- `perf` - Performance improvements
- `style` - Code style changes
- `build` - Build system changes
